details.translations: Our Lord, we have believed, so register us among the witnesses.

details.arabic_diacless: وما لـنا لا نؤمن باللٰه وما جاءنا من الحـقۙ ونطمع ان يدخلـنا ربنا مع القوم الصٰلحين‏
details.arabic: وَمَا لَـنَا لَا نُؤۡمِنُ بِاللّٰهِ وَمَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ الۡحَـقِّۙ وَنَطۡمَعُ اَنۡ يُّدۡخِلَـنَا رَبُّنَا مَعَ الۡقَوۡمِ الصّٰلِحِيۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: Wama lana la nu/minu billahiwama jaana mina alhaqqi wanatmaAAuan yudkhilana rabbuna maAAa alqawmi assaliheen
details.translations: And why should we not believe in Allah and what has come to us of the truth? And we aspire that our Lord will admit us [to Paradise] with the righteous people."
